creator: carsten.ziegert@ik.fh-hannover.de
text:
Line 224: attribute destfile of <war> tag shoul be "warfile"
Line 222: attribute name of <target> should have the value "war" rather than "war-
release" according to Tom Dyson's install manual at
http://torchbox.com/xml/xindice/xindice.html
(or change the manual)

From the Ant 1.5.1 manual

warfile  Deprecated name of the file to create -use destfile instead.

The manual must be changed (we will support manuals placed on the Xindice website)
creator: vladimir@bossicard.com
